SEARCH
Package org.fluentjdbc

Class DatabaseColumnReference

java.lang.Object
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseColumnReference
@CheckReturnValue public class DatabaseColumnReference extends Object
Describes a database column alias for a SELECT * FROM table a JOIN table b ON a.column = b.column expression. DatabaseColumnReference binds together the table, table alias and column name
